QuestData.Title: The Defense of Grom'gol: Ogre Oppression
QuestData.Description: When we first arrived in this jungle we did not intend to wage war on the local tribes. Our mission to supply Stonard is of the highest priority. But complications have arisen. A local band of ogres has occupied the Mizjah Ruins to the southeast of Grom'gol. Despite warnings, they continue to ambush our supply caravans.$b$bI am putting you in charge of dealing with these uncooperative ogres.$b$bTravel to the ruins and attempt to drive them from the area. At the very least it will send a firm message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Mosh'ogg Brutes and 4 Mosh'ogg Witch Doctors.
QuestData.CompletionText: I need Mizjah to be cleaned of ogres, $n. Now get to it!
QuestData.RewardText: I see you are good for more than simple egg-smashing duty. Good. The Horde can use a capable $r like you.
